body.name: Safety 1st Getaway All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, Sitting Pretty
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 50 mins
features: With two modes of use, this LATCH-equipped Safety 1st car seat accommodates infants from 5 pounds up to toddlers weighing 40 pounds in rear-facing mode and kids up to 40 pounds in forward-facing mode.
The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the seat and features six heights and three buckle locations.
In both the rear-facing and forward-facing modes, built-in side-impact protection keeps your little one extra secure.
Easily remove the machine-washable and dryer-safe car seat pad to clean.
Perfect for travel, the seat is certified for use on aircraft and gives your child a familiar seat during a flight.
body.description: Give your child a comfy rear-facing ride all the way up to 40 pounds. With two modes of use, this LATCH-equipped car seat allows babies to remain in a safer rear-facing position up to 40 pounds. Accommodating your toddler, it can then change to forward-facing position 22 to 40 pounds and 43 inches in height. The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the seat and features six heights and three buckle locations. In both the rear-facing and forward-facing modes, built-in side-impact protection keeps your little one extra secure. Easily remove the machine-washable and dryer-safe car seat pad to clean. Perfect for travel, the seat is certified for use on aircraft and gives your child a familiar seat during a flight. This car seat meets or exceeds federal and ASTM safety standards and includes a one-year limited warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BUILD FOR KID COMFORT SAFETY WITH A VIEW What fun is a car ride if you can't see out the window? Our headrests are designed to protect little noggins and let kids see the world. BUILD TO GROW From the headrest, to the harness straps, the seat has adjustment options to fit kids from birth to 10 years RIDE IN COMFORT In forward facing mode, out seat has two position options to get the best possible fit in your vehicle. Kids can stay more comfortable in their seat, even in the upright mode position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This seat will last a long time
reviews.reviewText: Love this car seat. My grandson likes it too. He has room to grow in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable car seat
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is affordable and does the job of keeping my child safe. However, the box came very damaged. Luckily, the car seat itself wasn’t damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: My youngest was always so frustrated in her tiny car seat. This new car seat gives her space to move and get comfy as well as talk with her big sister! It's the perfect upgrade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As others have mentioned, this car seat is shipped alone in a box. No other packaging or protective covering. This is concerning because my order was delivered today, in the middle of a snow storm. It sat outside in the snow for a couple hours before I made I home from work. The box was wet but luckily the car seat was fine inside.Seat is very pretty in pink. It has some cushion to it. I purchased for my granddaughter to keep in my car. So, this simple, no frills, budget version is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Budget friendly option, but not very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I've owned several carseat brands over my 14 years of being a mother, this being my first by Safety 1st. It's definitely a budget friendly option. You can trust that it is safe because all carseats must pass the same safety standards to be sold. However, this is probably the least padded/comfortable car seat I've owned for my kids thus far. The "padding" is quite thin and you can feel the hard plastic underneath. The button that allows you to tighten/loosen the straps is a pain to reach. The buckles are plastic and even though I know they're safe (because they have to be), it just personally feels cheap to me. It does have a pad that goes behind the head, but it does nothing to prevent my child's head from falling in an uncomfortable way if she falls asleep. In my opinion, I would personally pay a bit more for a more comfortable seat, but this seat works great for families on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Estaba buscando algo cómodo para mi niña y lo conseguí, es liviano fácil de posicionar y muy cómodo para mi niña de 1 año 4 meses estoy muy satisfecha con mi compra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safety and Comfort Unite: A Parent's Dream Car Seat
reviews.reviewText: The Safety 1st Getaway All-in-One Convertible Car Seat in Haze has exceeded all expectations, making it a standout choice for parents seeking the best for their little ones. The sleek design, coupled with the Haze color, adds a touch of sophistication to the car interior. Installation is a breeze, providing a secure fit that gives peace of mind during every journey.Versatility is a key highlight, offering rear-facing, forward-facing, and booster seat options to accommodate different stages of a child's growth. The adjustable features ensure maximum comfort, and the plush padding provides a cozy experience for my child. Safety features are top-notch, meeting and exceeding all safety standards, making it a reliable choice for parents prioritizing their child's well-being.What truly sets the Getaway apart is its user-friendly design. Buckling and unbuckling are effortless, and the seat cover is easy to remove and clean – a lifesaver for busy parents. The durability of materials used instills confidence, and the attention to detail in crafting this car seat reflects Safety 1st's commitment to child safety.In conclusion, the Safety 1st Getaway All-in-One Convertible Car Seat in Haze is a stellar investment for parents who refuse to compromise on safety, comfort, and style. This car seat has truly become an integral part of our family's journeys, and I wholeheartedly give it a well-deserved five-star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft cover and big enough
reviews.reviewText: The chair boasts excellent quality, with its interior covered in a soft material and featuring a secure, robust strap. It performs admirably for larger children and can withstand the weight of heavier kids. It would be beneficial to include level tools on the sides for easier installation, especially in large SUVs with spacious seats. Despite this challenge, the chair maintains its overall high quality. Additionally, the inclusion of extra soft cushions would enhance comfort for children using the seat.
